thread.title: Your first trade for Monday, July 6
thread.title_full: Your first trade for Monday, July 6

title: Your first trade for Monday, July 6
text:
Thursday, 2 Jul 2015 | 6:19 PM ET CNBC.com SHARES

Fast Money Final Trade: FB, ZAYO, DB & VLO

The Fast Money traders share their final trades of the day.

The " Fast Money " traders gave their final trades of the day. Tim Seymour was a buyer of FB . David Seaburg was a buyer ZAYO . Brian Kelly was a buyer of DB . Guy Adami was a buyer of VLO . Trader disclosure: On July 2, 2015 the following stocks and commodities mentioned or intended to be mentioned on CNBC's "Fast Money" were owned by the "Fast Money" traders: Tim Seymour is long AAPL, T, BAC, C, DIS, F, GE, GM, GOOGL, INTC, JPM, SUNE, Tim's firm is long BABA, BIDU, MCD, NKE, NOK, SBUX, YHOO. Brian Kelly is long BBRY, BTC=; TAN, TLT, TSL, U.S. 30-year bonds; he is short Euro, Yuan, and Yen. Today he bought TLT and U.S. 30-year bonds. Guy Adami is long CELG, EXAS, INTC, Guy Adami's wife, Linda Snow, works at Merck.
